anya-e0803n4:69: Satto macco jano bhūto, pāṇo hindagu puggalo;
anya-e0803n4:70: Jantu jīvo jagu yakkho, pāṇī dehī tathāgato.
anya-e0803n4:71: Sattavo mātiyo loko, manujo mānavo naro;

anya-e0803n4:78_0: Bhavanaṁ bhavo, bhavo vuccati vuddhi. Bhūsaddassa atthātisayayogato vaḍḍhanepi dissamānattā
anya-e0803n4:78_1: bhavanaṁ vaḍḍhananti katvā. ‘‘Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño’’ti idaṁ vuddhiatthassa
anya-e0803n4:78_2: sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Atha vā bhavoti vuccati sassataṁ. ‘‘Sassato attā ca loko cā’’ti
anya-e0803n4:78_3: hi sassatavasena pavattā diṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhi, tasmā bhavadiṭṭhī’’ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n4:78_4: sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Tathā bhavoti bhavadiṭṭhi, bhavati sassataṁ tiṭṭhatīti pavattanato
anya-e0803n4:78_5: sassatadiṭṭhi bhavadiṭṭhi nāma. Bhavadiṭṭhi hi uttarapadalopena bhavoti vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:78_6: ‘‘Bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamāhaṁsū’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Etthāyaṁ
anya-e0803n4:78_7: pāḷivacanattho – ekacce samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhavadiṭṭhiyā vā kāmabhavādinā vā sabbabhavato
anya-e0803n4:78_8: vimuttiṁ saṁsāravisuddhiṁ kathayiṁsūti. Atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etenāti
anya-e0803n4:78_9: bhavoti atthena sampattipuññāni bhavoti ca vuccanti. ‘‘Itibhavābhavatañca vītivatto’’ti
anya-e0803n4:78_10: idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Ettha panāyaṁ pāḷivacanattho – bhavoti sampatti,
anya-e0803n4:78_11: abhavoti vipatti. Tathā bhavoti vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti sassataṁ, abhavoti
anya-e0803n4:78_12: ucchedo. Bhavoti puññaṁ, abhavoti pāpaṁ, taṁ sabbaṁ vītivattoti.
anya-e0803n4:79_0: Sahokāsā khandhāpi bhavo. ‘‘Kāmabhavo rūpabhavo’’ iccevamādi etassatthassa sādhakaṁ
anya-e0803n4:79_1: vacanaṁ. Ettha pana khandhā ‘‘yo paññāyati, so sarūpaṁ labhatī’’ti katvā ‘‘bhavati
anya-e0803n4:79_2: avijjātaṇhādisamudayā nirantaraṁ samudetī’’ti atthena vā ‘‘bhavā’’ti vuccanti. Okāso
anya-e0803n4:79_3: pana ‘‘bhavanti jāyanti ettha sattā nāmarūpadhammā cā’’ti atthena ‘‘bhavo’’ti. Apica
anya-e0803n4:79_4: kammabhavopi bhavo, upapattibhavopi bhavo. ‘‘Upādānapaccayā bhavo duvidhena atthi
anya-e0803n4:79_5: kammabhavo, atthi upapattibhavo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Tattha kammameva
anya-e0803n4:79_6: bhavo kammabhavo. Tathā upapatti eva bhavo upapattibhavo. Etthūpapatti bhavatīti
anya-e0803n4:79_7: bhavo, kammaṁ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā ‘‘sukho buddhānamuppādo’’ti vutto. Evaṁ bhavakāraṇattā
anya-e0803n4:79_8: phalavohārena bhavoti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Atha vā bhāvanalakkhaṇattā bhāvetīti bhavo. Kiṁ
anya-e0803n4:79_9: bhāveti? Upapattiṁ. Iti upapattiṁ bhāvetīti bhavoti vuccati. Bhāvetītimassa ca nibbattetīti
anya-e0803n4:79_10: hetukattuvasenattho. Atha vā ‘‘bhavapaccayā jātī’’ti vacanato bhavati etenāti bhavoti kammabhavo vuccati.
anya-e0803n4:82_0: Vuttalakkhaṇo saṁsāropi bhavo. ‘‘Bhave dukkhaṁ bhavadukkhaṁ, bhave saṁsaranto’’ti
anya-e0803n4:82_1: imānetassatthassa sādhakāni vacanāni. Tatra kenaṭṭhena saṁsāro bhavoti kathīyati?
anya-e0803n4:82_2: Bhavati ettha sattasammuti khandhādipaṭipāṭisaṅkhāte dhammapuñjasminti atthena .
anya-e0803n4:93_0: Bhāvoti ajjhāsayo, yo ‘‘adhippāyo’’tipi vuccati. ‘‘Thīnaṁbhāvo durājāno. Nāmacco

anya-e0803n4:93_8: Sā ca bhavanagamanapacanādivasenānekavidhā. Apica bhāvarūpampi bhāvo, yaṁ itthibhāvo
anya-e0803n4:93_9: pumbhāvo itthindriyanti ca vuccati. Tatrāyaṁ vacanattho – ‘‘itthī’’ti vā ‘‘puriso’’ti
anya-e0803n4:93_10: vā bhavati etena cittaṁ abhidhānañcāti bhāvo.

anya-e0803n4:97_3: iccevattho. ‘‘Sāmaññaṁ vā sabhāvo vā, dhammānaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ mata’’nti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n4:97_4: sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Apica sabhāvoti salakkhaṇo paramatthadhammo. Kenaṭṭhena? Saha bhāvenāti
anya-e0803n4:97_5: atthena. Sabbhāvoti sataṁ bhāvo sabbhāvo, sappurisadhammo iccevattho. Atha vā attano
anya-e0803n4:97_6: bhāvo sabbhāvo. ‘‘Gāhāpayanti sabbhāva’’nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Saṁvijjamāno
anya-e0803n4:97_7: vā bhāvo sabbhāvo. ‘‘Evaṁ gahaṇasabbhāvo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:98_0: Sambhavoti sambhavanaṁ sambhavo, sambhavanakriyā, yutti vā. Yutti hi sambhavoti vuccati
anya-e0803n4:98_1: ‘‘sambhavo gahaṇassa kāraṇa’’ntiādīsu. Atha vā sambhavati etasmāti sambhavo. Yato
anya-e0803n4:98_2: hi yaṁ kiñci sambhavati, so sambhavo. Pabhavoti pabhavanaṁ pabhavo, acchinnatā, pabhavati
anya-e0803n4:98_3: etasmāti vā pabhavo. Yato hi yaṁ kiñci pabhavati, so pabhavo. Ime pana sambhavapabhavasaddā
anya-e0803n4:98_4: katthaci samānatthā katthaci bhinnatthāti veditabbā. Kathaṁ? Sambhavasaddo hi bhavanakriyampi
anya-e0803n4:98_5: vadati yuttimpi paññattimpi sambhavarūpampi paccayatthampi, pabhavasaddo pana bhavanakriyampi
anya-e0803n4:98_6: vadati nadippabhavampi paccayatthampi, tasmā paccayatthaṁ vajjetvā bhinnatthāti gahetabbā,
anya-e0803n4:98_7: paccayatthena pana samānatthāti gahetabbā. Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘paccayo hetu nidānaṁ kāraṇaṁ
anya-e0803n4:98_8: sambhavo pabhavotiādi atthato ekaṁ, byañjanato nāna’’nti.
anya-e0803n4:101: Ayampi gāthā etassatthassa sādhikā. Idaṁ sambhavapabhavasaddānaṁ bhāvāpādānasādhanavasenatthakathanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:102_1: sampadānasādhanena sattavidhāni bhavanti, taṁ pana uttari āvibhavissati ‘‘dhanamassa
anya-e0803n4:102_2: bhavatūti dhanabhūtī’’tiādinā. Iccevaṁ kitakavasena sabbathāpi sattavidhāni sādhanāni
anya-e0803n4:102_3: honti, yāni ‘‘kārakānī’’tipi vuccati, ito aññaṁ sādhanaṁ natthi. Idha payogesvatthesu
anya-e0803n4:102_4: ca viññūnaṁ pāṭavatthaṁ sādhananāmaṁ pakāsitaṁ. Tathā hi dunnikkhittasādhanehi padehi
anya-e0803n4:102_5: yojitā saddappayogā dubbodhatthā honti, sunikkhittasādhanehi pana padehi yojitā subodhatthā
anya-e0803n4:102_6: honti, tasmā payogāsādhanamūlakā, attho ca payogamūlako. Payogānurūpañhi aviparītaṁ
anya-e0803n4:102_7: katvā atthaṁ kathanasīlā ‘‘yācitova bahulaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjati, appaṁ ayācito’’ti
anya-e0803n4:102_8: evamādīsu sādhanavasena gahetabbesu atthesu, aññesu catthesu paṭutarabuddhino paṇḍitāyeva
anya-e0803n4:102_9: ekantena bhagavato pariyattisāsanadharā nāma hontīti veditabbaṁ. Ito paraṁ nayānusārena
anya-e0803n4:102_10: suviññeyyattā ‘‘idaṁ nāma sādhana’’nti na vakkhāma, kevalamidha dassitesu payogesu
anya-e0803n4:103_0: Pabhāvoti pakārato bhavatīti pabhāvo, soyamānubhāvoyeva. ‘‘Pabhāvaṁ te na passāmi,
anya-e0803n4:103_1: yena tvaṁ mithilaṁ vaje’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Anubhavoti anubhavanaṁ
anya-e0803n4:103_2: anubhavo, kiṁ taṁ? Paribhuñjanaṁ. Ānubhāvoti tejussāhamantapabhūsattiyo. ‘‘Tejasaṅkhato
anya-e0803n4:103_3: ussāhamantapabhūsattisaṅkhāto vā mahanto ānubhāvo etassāti mahānubhāvo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:105: Ānubhāvāti vuccanti, pabhāvāti ca te vade.
anya-e0803n4:108_0: Atha vā ānubhāvoti anubhavitabbaphalaṁ. ‘‘Anubhavitabbassa phalassa mahantatāya mahānubhāvo’’ti
anya-e0803n4:108_1: idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Parābhavoti parābhavanaṁ parābhavo, atha vā parābhavatīti
anya-e0803n4:108_2: parābhavo. ‘‘Suvijāno parābhavo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Apica ‘‘dhammadessī
anya-e0803n4:108_3: parābhavo’’ti pāṭhānurūpato parābhavissatīti parābhavoti anāgatakālavasenapi nibbacanaṁ
anya-e0803n4:108_4: daṭṭhabbaṁ. Atha vā parābhavanti etenāti parābhavo. Kiṁ taṁ? Dhammadessitādi. ‘‘Paṭhamo
anya-e0803n4:108_5: so parābhavo’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Vibhavoti nibbānaṁ. Tañhi bhavato
anya-e0803n4:108_6: vigatattā bhavato vigatoti vibhavo, bhavassa ca taṁhetu vigatattā vigato bhavo etasmāti
anya-e0803n4:108_7: vibhavo. Vibhavanti ucchijjanti vinassanti ito ariyadhanavilomakā kilesamahācorātipi
anya-e0803n4:108_8: vibhavo. Vibhavasaddassa nibbānābhidhānatte ‘‘evaṁ bhave vijjamāne, vibhavo icchitabbako’’ti
anya-e0803n4:108_9: idamettha sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Imāni pana nibbānassa pariyāyavacanāni –
anya-e0803n4:109: Nibbānaṁ vibhavo mokkho, nirodho amataṁ samaṁ;
anya-e0803n4:118: Santi asaṅkhatā dhātu, disā ca sabbatopabhaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:131_0: Vibhavoti vā vināsasampattidhanucchedadiṭṭhiyopi vuccanti. Tattha vināso vibhavanaṁ
anya-e0803n4:131_1: ucchijjanaṁ nassananti atthena vibhavo. ‘‘Vibhavo sabbadhammānaṁ, ittheke sato sattassa
anya-e0803n4:131_2: ucchedaṁ vināsaṁ vibhavaṁ paññapentī’’ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Sampatti
anya-e0803n4:131_3: pana visesato bhavatīti vibhavo. ‘‘Rañño sirivibhavaṁ daṭṭhukāmā’’ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n4:131_4: sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Dhanaṁ pana bhavanti vaḍḍhanti vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti
anya-e0803n4:131_5: sattā etenāti vibhavo. ‘‘Asītikoṭivibhavassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbattī’’ti
anya-e0803n4:131_6: idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Idaṁ pana pariyāyavacanaṁ –
anya-e0803n4:132: Dhanaṁ saṁ vibhavo dabbaṁ, sāpateyyaṁ pariggaho;
anya-e0803n4:133: Oḍḍaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ sakaṁ attho, iccete dhanavācakā.
anya-e0803n4:134_0: Ucchedadiṭṭhi pana vibhavati ucchijjati ‘‘attā ca loko ca puna cutito uddhaṁ na jāyatī’’ti
anya-e0803n4:134_1: gahaṇato vibhavoti. ‘‘Vibhavataṇhā’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Vibhavataṇhāti
anya-e0803n4:134_2: hi ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatāya taṇhāya nāmaṁ. Ettha atthuddhāro vuccati –
anya-e0803n4:137_0: Pātubhāvoti pātubhavanaṁ pātubhāvo. Āvibhāvoti āvibhavanaṁ āvibhāvo, ubhinnametesaṁ
anya-e0803n4:137_1: pākaṭatā iccevattho. Tirobhāvoti tirobhavanaṁ tirobhāvo, paṭicchannabhāvo. Vinābhāvoti
anya-e0803n4:137_2: vinābhavanaṁ vinābhāvo, viyogo. Sotthibhāvoti sotthibhavanaṁ sotthibhāvo, suvatthibhāvo
anya-e0803n4:137_3: sukhassa atthitā, atthato pana nibbhayatā nirupaddavatā eva. Atthibhāvoti atthitā
anya-e0803n4:137_4: vijjamānatā avivittatā. Natthibhāvoti natthitā avijjamānatā vivittatā rittatā tucchatā
anya-e0803n4:138_0: Abhibhavatīti abhibhavitā, paraṁ abhibhavanto yo koci. Evaṁ paribhavitā, anubhavatīti
anya-e0803n4:138_1: anubhavitā, sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā anubhavanto yo koci. Evaṁ samanubhavitā.
anya-e0803n4:138_2: Paccanubhavitā, ettha pana yathā ‘‘amatassa dātā. Anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā’’tiādīsu
anya-e0803n4:138_4: saddhiṁ yojanā dissati, tathā imesampi padānaṁ ‘‘paccāmittassa abhibhavitā’’tiādinā
anya-e0803n4:138_5: yojanā kātabbā. Evaṁ aññesampi evarūpānaṁ padānaṁ. Ākārantapulliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:139_0: Bhavatīti bhavaṁ. Bhavissatīti vā bhavaṁ, vaḍḍhamāno puggalo. ‘‘Suvijāno bhavaṁ hoti,
anya-e0803n4:139_1: suvijāno parābhavo. Dhammakāmo bhavaṁ hoti, dhammadessī parābhavo’’ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n4:139_2: sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Atha vā yena saddhiṁ katheti, so ‘‘bhava’’nti vattabbo, ‘‘bhavaṁ
anya-e0803n4:139_3: kaccāyano. Bhavaṁ ānando. Maññe bhavaṁ patthayati, rañño bhariyaṁ patibbata’’ntiādīsu.
anya-e0803n4:139_4: Ettha pana dhātuatthe ādaro na kātabbo, sammutiattheyevādaro kātabbo ‘‘saṅketavacanaṁ
anya-e0803n4:139_5: saccaṁ, lokasammutikāraṇa’’nti vacanato. Vohāravisayasmiñhi lokasammuti eva padhānā
anya-e0803n4:139_6: avilaṅghanīyā. Parābhavatīti parābhavaṁ. Evaṁ paribhavaṁ. Abhibhavaṁ. Anubhavaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:139_7: Pabhavati pahoti sakkotīti pabhavaṁ, pahonto yo koci. Na pabhavaṁ appabhavaṁ, ‘‘appabhava’’nti
anya-e0803n4:141: Sohaṁ appabhavaṁ tattha, sākhaṁ hatthehi aggahi’’nti
anya-e0803n4:143_0: Dhanabhūtīti dhanamassa bhavatūti dhanabhūti. Siribhūtīti sobhāya ceva paññāpuññānañca
anya-e0803n4:143_1: adhivacanaṁ. Sā assa bhavatūti siribhūti. Evaṁ sotthibhūti, suvatthibhūti. Ikārantapulliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:144_0: Bhāvīti bhavanasīlo bhāvī, bhavanadhammo bhāvī, bhavane sādhukārī bhāvī. Evaṁ vibhāvī.
anya-e0803n4:144_1: Sambhāvī. Paribhāvīti. Tatra vibhāvīti atthavibhāvane samattho paṇḍito vuccati. Ettha
anya-e0803n4:144_2: vidvā, vijjāgato, ñāṇītiādi pariyāyavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Bhavanti catra –
anya-e0803n4:145: Vidvā vijjāgato ñāṇī, vibhāvī paṇḍito sudhī;
anya-e0803n4:146: Budho visārado viññū, dosaññū viddasu vidū.
anya-e0803n4:147: Vipassī paṭibhāṇī ca, medhāvī nipako kavi;
anya-e0803n4:148: Kusalo viduro dhīmā, gatimā mutimā cayaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:149: Cakkhumā kaṇṇavā dabbo, dhīro bhūri vicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0803n4:152: Sayambhūti sayameva bhavatīti sayambhū. Ko so? Antarena paropadesaṁ sāmaṁyeva sabbaṁ ñeyyadhammaṁ paṭivijjhitvā sabbaññutaṁ patto sakyamuni bhagavā. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā –
anya-e0803n4:153: ‘‘Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0803n4:155: Ahañhi arahā loke, ahaṁ satthā anuttaro;
anya-e0803n4:157_0: Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena saha vāsanāya vigataviddhastaniravasesakileso
anya-e0803n4:157_2: khandhasantāno loke aggapuggaloti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘ekapuggalo bhikkhave
anya-e0803n4:157_3: loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso, katamo ekapuggalo? Tathāgato bhikkhave
anya-e0803n4:157_4: arahaṁ sammāsambuddho’’ti. So ekapuggalo etarahi ‘‘sabbaññū, sugato’’tiādīhi yathābhuccaguṇādhigatanāmehi
anya-e0803n4:157_5: ca pasiddho, ‘‘gotamo ādiccabandhū’’ti gottato ca pasiddho, sakyaputto sakko sakyamuni
anya-e0803n4:157_6: sakyasīho sakyapuṅgavoti kulato ca pasiddho, suddhodanimāyādevīsutoti mātāpitito
anya-e0803n4:157_7: ca pasiddho, siddhatthoti gahitanāmena ca pasiddho. Bhavanti catra –
anya-e0803n4:158: Yo ekapuggalo āsi, buddho so vadataṁ varo;
anya-e0803n4:161: Sakko iti ca avhito, tathā sakyamunīti ca.
anya-e0803n4:186: Sammāsambuddho iti so, ñāto sattuttamoti ca;
anya-e0803n4:193: Nāmaṁ guṇehi nissitaṁ, ko kavindo kathessati.
anya-e0803n4:204: Tathā hi satthavāho naravaro chaḷabhiññoti evaṁpakārāni abhidhānapadāni visesakapadāpekkhakāni. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n4:211: ‘‘Chaḷabhiññassa sāsana’’nti ca evaṁ visesakapadāpekkhakāni bhavanti. Buddho jino bhagavāti evaṁpakārāni pana no visesakāpekkhānīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:212_0: Keci panettha evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu
anya-e0803n4:212_1: ravibandhūti evaṁpakārānaṁ idha vuttānamabhidhānānaṁ visesatthābhāvato punaruttidoso
anya-e0803n4:212_3: anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānānīti dvedhā dissanato. Tathā hi katthaci keci ‘‘sakyasīho’’ti
anya-e0803n4:212_5: pāvacanepi hi ‘‘dviduggamavarahanutta’malatthā’’ti pāṭho dissati. Tathā keci ‘‘dhammarājā’’ti
anya-e0803n4:212_10: paṭicca ‘‘nīrajaṁ kuñja’’ntiādīni abhisaṅkharonti. Pāvacanepi hi yaṁ padumaṁ, taṁ
anya-e0803n4:212_11: jalajaṁ nāmāti mantvā paṭisambhidāppattehi ariyehi desanāvilāsavasena vutto ‘‘padumuttaranāmino’’ti
anya-e0803n4:212_12: vattabbaṭṭhāne ‘‘jalajuttaranāmino’’ti pāṭho dissati. Evaṁ abhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni dissanti.
anya-e0803n4:213_0: ‘‘Buddho bhagavā’’ti abhidhānāni pana anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni. Vuttañhetaṁ dhammasenāpatinā
anya-e0803n4:213_1: āyasmatā sāriputtena ‘‘buddhoti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kataṁ, na pitarā kataṁ, na bhaginiyā
anya-e0803n4:213_2: kataṁ, na ñātisālohitehi kataṁ, na devatāhi kataṁ, vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ
anya-e0803n4:213_3: bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ buddho’’ti,
anya-e0803n4:213_4: tathā ‘‘bhagavāti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kataṁ…pe… sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ bhagavā’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:213_5: Evaṁ ‘‘buddho bhagavā’’ti abhidhānāni anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni. Na hi tāni abhidhānāni
anya-e0803n4:213_6: ceva ‘‘satthā sugato jino’’tiādīni ca aññaṁ kiñci abhidhānaṁ paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni,
anya-e0803n4:213_7: nāpi aññāni abhidhānāni etāni paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni dissanti. Tathā hi ‘‘buddho’’ti
anya-e0803n4:213_8: abhidhānaṁ paṭicca ‘‘bujjhitā bodhetā bodhako’’tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni na abhisaṅkharonti.
anya-e0803n4:213_9: Tathā ‘‘bhagavā satthā sugato’’tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni paṭicca ‘‘sampannabhago anusāsako
anya-e0803n4:213_10: sundaravacano’’tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni nābhisaṅkharonti. Evaṁ imaṁ vibhāgaṁ dassetuṁ
anya-e0803n4:213_11: ‘‘munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu ravibandhū’’tiādinā nayena
anya-e0803n4:213_12: punarutti amhehi katāti daṭṭhabbā. Evamaññatrāpi nayo netabbo. Atridaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n4:215: Dviduggamavaro buddho, iti nāmaṁ dvidhā bhave’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:216_0: Pabhūti paraṁ pasayha bhavatīti pabhū, issaro. ‘‘Araññassa pabhū ayaṁ luddako’’ti
anya-e0803n4:216_1: idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Abhibhūti abhibhavatīti abhibhū, asaññasatto.
anya-e0803n4:216_2: Kiṁ so abhibhavi? Cattāro khandhe arūpino. Iti cattāro khandhe arūpino abhibhavīti
anya-e0803n4:216_3: abhibhū. So ca kho niccetanattā abhibhavanakriyāyāsati pubbevā’saññuppattito jhānalābhikāle
anya-e0803n4:216_4: attanā adhigatapañcamajjhānaṁ saññāvirāgavasena bhāvetvā cattāro arūpakkhandhe asaññibhave
anya-e0803n4:216_5: appavattikaraṇena abhibhavitumārabhi, tadabhibhavanakiccaṁ idāni siddhanti abhibhavīti
anya-e0803n4:216_6: abhibhūti vuccati. Apica niccetanabhāvena abhibhavanabyāpāre asatipi pubbe sacetanakāle
anya-e0803n4:216_7: sabyāpārattā sacetanassa viya niccetanassāpi sato tassa upacārena sabyāpāratāvacanaṁ
anya-e0803n4:216_8: yujjateva. Dissati hi loke sāsane ca sacetanassa viya acetanassapi upacārena sabyāpāratāvacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:216_9: Taṁ yathā? Kūlaṁ patitukāmaṁ, evaṁ loke. Sāsane pana –
anya-e0803n4:219_0: ‘‘Aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante, phalesino chadanaṁ vippahāyā’’ti ca ‘‘phalaṁ toseti
anya-e0803n4:219_1: kassaka’’nti ca ādi. Abhibhūsaddassa asaññasattābhidhānatte ‘‘abhibhuṁ abhibhuto
anya-e0803n4:219_2: maññatī’’ti idamettha sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Atha vā abhibhavatīti abhibhū, paresamabhibhavitā
anya-e0803n4:219_3: yo koci. Visesato pana tathāgatoyeva abhibhū. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘tathāgato bhikkhave
anya-e0803n4:219_4: abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī’’ti. Keci pana ‘‘abhibhū nāma sahasso brahmā’’ti vadanti.
anya-e0803n4:220_0: Vibhūti visesabhūtoti vibhū, ‘‘bhavasotaṁ sace buddho, tiṇṇo lokantagū vibhū’’ti
anya-e0803n4:220_1: idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Vibhūti hettha rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā visesabhūtoti attho. Āha ca –
anya-e0803n4:225: Dhārento brāhmaṇaṁ vaṇṇaṁ, bhikkhāya maṁ upāgamī’’ti –
anya-e0803n4:226_0: Idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Patibhūti patibhūtoti patibhū, ‘‘goṇassa patibhū’’ti
anya-e0803n4:226_1: idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Gotrabhūti gottasaṅkhātaṁ amatamahānibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0803n4:226_2: katvā bhūtoti gotrabhū, sotāpattimaggassa anantarapaccayena sikhāppattabalavavipassanācittena
anya-e0803n4:226_3: samannāgato puggalo. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘katamo ca puggalo gotrabhū? Yesaṁ dhammānaṁ
anya-e0803n4:226_4: samanantarā ariyadhammassa avakkanti hoti, tehi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo gotrabhū’’ti,
anya-e0803n4:226_5: idamevettha atthasādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Apica samaṇoti gottamattamanubhavamāno kāsāvakaṇṭhasamaṇopi
anya-e0803n4:226_6: gotrabhū. So hi ‘‘samaṇo’’ti gottamattaṁ anubhavati vindati, na samaṇadhamme attani
anya-e0803n4:226_8: gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:226_9: Vatrabhūti sakko. So hi mātāpitibharaṇādīhi sattahi vattehi sakkattaṁ labhitvā aññe
anya-e0803n4:226_10: deve vattena abhibhavatīti vatrabhū. Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana bhūdhātumhi labbhamānaṁ
anya-e0803n4:226_11: pattiatthampi gahetvā ‘‘vattena aññe abhibhavitvā devissariyaṁ pattoti vatrabhū’’ti
anya-e0803n4:226_12: vuttaṁ, ‘‘vatranāmakaṁ vā asuraṁ abhibhavatīti vatrabhū’’ti ca, ‘‘vatrabhū jayataṁpitā’’ti
anya-e0803n4:226_13: idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Ettha hi vatrabhūti vatranāmakassa asurassa abhibhavitā.
anya-e0803n4:226_14: Jayataṁ pitāti jayantānaṁ pitā. ‘‘Sakko indo purindado’’ iccādi pariyāyavacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:226_15: Idaṁ tu dhātādhikāre pakāsessāma. Parābhibhūti paramabhibhavatīti parābhibhū. Evaṁ
anya-e0803n4:226_17: Sabbābhibhūti ca idaṁ nāmaṁ tathāgatasseva yujjati. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā –
anya-e0803n4:232_0: Idāni aniyataliṅgānaṁ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūtaparābhūta sambhūtasaddādīnaṁ
anya-e0803n4:232_1: niddeso vuccati. Tatra bhūtoti attano paccayehi abhavīti bhūto, bhūtoti jāto sañjāto
anya-e0803n4:232_2: nibbatto abhinibbatto pātubhūto, bhūtoti vā laddhasarūpo yo koci saviññāṇako vā aviññāṇako
anya-e0803n4:232_3: vā. Atha vā tathākārena bhavatīti bhūto, bhūtoti sacco tatho avitatho aviparīto yo
anya-e0803n4:232_4: koci, ettha yo bhūtasaddo saccattho, tassa ‘‘bhūtaṭṭho’’ti idamettha sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:232_5: Parābhūtoti parābhavīti parābhūto. Suṭṭhu bhūtoti sambhūto. Visesena bhūtoti vibhūto.
anya-e0803n4:232_6: Vissuto bhūtoti vā vibhūto, ‘‘vibhūtārammaṇa’’nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:232_7: Vibhavīti vā vibhūto, vinaṭṭhoti attho, ‘‘rūpe vibhūte na phusanti phassā’’ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n4:232_8: sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Pākaṭo bhūtoti pātubhūto. Āvi bhavatīti āvibhūto. Evaṁ tirobhūto.
anya-e0803n4:232_9: Vinābhūto. Bhavitumanucchavikoti bhabbo. Paribhaviyate soti paribhūto. Yena kenaci
anya-e0803n4:232_10: yo pīḷito hīḷito vā, so paribhūto. Gamyamānattho yathākāmacārī. Abhibhaviyyate soti
anya-e0803n4:232_11: abhibhūto. Adhibhaviyate soti adhibhūto. Evaṁ addhabhūto. Ettha adhisaddena samānattho
anya-e0803n4:232_12: addhasaddo, ‘‘cakkhu bhikkhave addhabhūtaṁ, rūpā addhabhūtā, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ addhabhūta’’nti
anya-e0803n4:232_13: idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ, tathā ‘‘idha bhikkhave bhikkhu na heva anaddhabhūtaṁ
anya-e0803n4:232_14: attānaṁ na addhabhāvetī’’ti padampi. Tattha anaddhabhūtanti dukkhena anadhibhūtaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:232_15: Dukkhena anadhibhūto nāma manussattabhāvo vuccati, taṁ na addhabhāveti nābhibhavatīti suttapadattho.
anya-e0803n4:233_0: Anubhaviyate soti anubhūto. Evaṁ samanubhūto. Paccanubhūto. Bhāvito. Ettha bhāvitoti
anya-e0803n4:233_1: iminā samānādhikaraṇaṁ ‘‘satisambojjhaṅgo kho kassapa mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito’’tiādīsu
anya-e0803n4:233_2: guṇīvācakaṁ padhānapadaṁ sāsane daṭṭhabbaṁ. Titthiyasamaye pana bhāvitoti kāmaguṇo
anya-e0803n4:233_3: vuccati. Vuttañhetaṁ pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘na bhāvitamāsīsatī’’ti. Tatra bhāvitā nāma pañca kāmaguṇā,
anya-e0803n4:233_4: te na āsīsati na sevatīti suttapadattho. Sambhāviyate soti sambhāvito. Evaṁ vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n4:233_5: Paribhāvito. Anuparibhūto. Manaṁparibhūtoti manaṁ paribhaviyittha soti manaṁparibhūto.
anya-e0803n4:233_6: Ettha manaṁparibhūtoti īsakaṁ appattaparibhavano vuccati. Mananti hi nipātapadaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:233_7: ‘‘Atipaṇḍitena puttena, manamhi upakūlito, devadattena attano abuddhabhāvena ceva
anya-e0803n4:233_8: khantimettādīnañca abhāvena kumārakassapatthero ca therī ca manaṁ nāsito, manaṁ vuḷho
anya-e0803n4:233_9: ahosī’’tiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo. Atra manaṁsaddassa kiñci yuttiṁ vadāma.
anya-e0803n4:235: Santaṁ tassa manaṁ hoti, manamhi upakūlitoti.
anya-e0803n4:236_0: Paribhavitabboti aññena paribhavituṁ sakkuṇeyyoti paribhavitabbo. Evaṁ paribhottabbo
anya-e0803n4:236_1: paribhavanīyo. Tabbapaccayaṭṭhāne hi sakkuṇeyyapadayojanā dissati ‘‘aladdhaṁ ārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0803n4:236_2: laddhabbaṁ labhanīyaṁ laddhuṁ vā sakkuṇeyya’’nti. Atha vā paribhavanamarahatīti paribhavitabbo.
anya-e0803n4:236_3: Evaṁ paribhottabbo paribhavanīyo. Tathā hi tabbapaccayaṭṭhāne arahatipadayojanā dissati
anya-e0803n4:236_4: ‘‘parisakkuṇeyyaṁ lābhamarahatīti laddhabba’’nti. Ettha pana paribhottabboti padassa
anya-e0803n4:236_5: atthibhāve ‘‘khattiyo kho mahārāja daharoti na uññātabbo na paribhottabbo’’ti pāḷi
anya-e0803n4:236_6: nidassanaṁ. Abhiadhipubbā bhūdhātuyo samānatthā. Sesāni dukāni nayānusārena ñeyyāni.
anya-e0803n4:236_7: Bhamānoti bhavatīti bhamāno, majjhe vakāralopo daṭṭhabbo. Atridaṁ vattabbaṁ –
anya-e0803n4:237: ‘‘Kiṁ so bhamāno saccako’’, iccatra pāḷiyaṁ pana;
anya-e0803n4:239_0: Atrāyaṁ pāḷi ‘‘kiṁ so bhamāno saccako nigaṇṭhaputto, yo bhagavato vādaṁ āropessatī’’ti.
anya-e0803n4:239_1: Vibhavamānoti vibhavatīti vibhavamāno. Evaṁ paribhavamānotiādīsu. Tattha ‘‘abhisambhonto’’timassa
anya-e0803n4:239_2: karonto nipphādento iccevattho. ‘‘Sabbāni abhisambhonto, sa rājavasatiṁ vase’’ti
anya-e0803n4:239_3: idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Yasmā panimāni ‘‘bhavamāno’’tiādīni vippakatapaccattavacanāni,
anya-e0803n4:239_4: tasmā saramāno rodati, gacchanto gaṇhāti, ‘‘gacchanto so bhāradvājo, addasa accutaṁ
anya-e0803n4:239_5: isi’’ntiādīni viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā rājā bhavamāno sampattimanubhavatītiādinā
anya-e0803n4:239_6: yojetabbāni. ‘‘Saramāno gacchanto’’tiādīni hi ‘‘yāto gato patto’’tiādīhi sadisāni
anya-e0803n4:239_7: na honti, uttarakriyāpadāpekkhakāni honti tvāpaccayantapadāni viyāti.
anya-e0803n4:240_0: Paribhaviyamānoti paribhaviyate soti paribhaviyamāno. Evaṁ paribhuyyamānotiādīsupi.
anya-e0803n4:240_1: Imānipi vippakatapaccattavacanāni, tasmā ‘‘rājapurisehi nīyamāno coro evaṁ cintesī’’tiādīni
anya-e0803n4:240_2: viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā aññehi paribhaviyamāno tāṇaṁ gavesati. Bhogo
anya-e0803n4:240_3: puggalenānubhaviyamāno parikkhayaṁ gacchatītiādinā yojetabbāni. Evaṁ sabbatra īdisesu
anya-e0803n4:240_4: vippakatavacanesu yojetabbāni. Ayaṁ aniyataliṅgānaṁ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṁ bhūta
anya-e0803n4:240_5: parābhūta sambhūtasaddānaṁ niddeso. Iccevaṁ pulliṅgānaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ yathārahaṁ
anya-e0803n4:241_0: Idāni itthiliṅganiddeso vuccati – tatra bhāvikāti bhāvetīti bhāvikā. Yā bhāvanaṁ
anya-e0803n4:241_1: karoti, sā bhāvikā. Bhāvanāti vaḍḍhanā brūhanā phātikaraṇaṁ āsevanā bahulīkāro. Vibhāvanāti
anya-e0803n4:241_2: pakāsanā sandassanā. Atha vā vibhāvanāti abhāvanā antaradhāpanā. Sambhāvanāti ukkaṁsanā
anya-e0803n4:241_3: thomanā. Paribhāvanāti vāsanā, samantato vā vaḍḍhanā. Ākārantitthiliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:242_0: Bhūmīti sattāyamānā bhavatīti bhūmi, atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha thāvarā
anya-e0803n4:242_1: ca jaṅgamā cāti bhūmi. Bhūmi vuccati pathavī. ‘‘Paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā’’tiādīsu
anya-e0803n4:242_2: pana lokuttaramaggo bhūmīti vuccati. Yā panandhabālamahājanena viññātā pathavī, tassimāni abhidhānāni –
anya-e0803n4:243: ‘‘Pathavī medanī bhūmi, bhūrī bhū puthuvī mahī;
anya-e0803n4:244: Chamā vasumatī ubbī, avanī ku vasundharā;
anya-e0803n4:245: Jagatī khiti vasudhā, dharaṇī go dharā’’iti.
anya-e0803n4:246: Atra bhū ku gosaddā pathavīpadatthe vattantīti kutra diṭṭhapubbāti ce?
anya-e0803n4:248: Bhū ku goiti pathavī, vuccatīti vibhāvaye.
anya-e0803n4:249_0: Bhūtīti bhavanaṁ bhūti. Vibhūtīti vināso, visesato bhavanaṁ vā, atha vā visesato
anya-e0803n4:249_1: bhavanti sattā etāyāti vibhūti, sampattiyeva, ‘‘rañño vibhūti. Pihanīyā vibhūtiyo’’ti
anya-e0803n4:250_0: Bhūrīti pathavī. Sā hi bhavanti etthāti bhūrīti vuccati, bhavati vā paññāyati vaḍḍhati
anya-e0803n4:250_1: cāti bhūrī, atha vā bhūtābhūtā tannissitā sattā ramanti etthāti bhūrī. Pathavīnissitā
anya-e0803n4:250_2: hi sattā pathaviyaṁyeva ramanti, tasmā sā imināpi atthena bhūrīti vuccati. Bhūrīsaddassa
anya-e0803n4:250_3: pathavīvacane ‘‘bhūripañño’’ti atthasādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Apica bhūrī viyāti bhūrī, paññā,
anya-e0803n4:250_4: bhūrīti pathavīsamāya vitthatāya paññāya nāmaṁ, ‘‘yogā ve jāyatī bhūrī, ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo’’ti
anya-e0803n4:250_5: ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ imassatthassa sādhakaṁ. Atha vā bhūte atthe ramatīti bhūrī,
anya-e0803n4:250_6: paññāyetaṁ nāmaṁ, ‘‘bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā’’ti ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ imassatthassa
anya-e0803n4:250_7: sādhakaṁ. Atha vā paññāyeva rāgādayo dhamme abhibhavatīti bhūrī, rāgādiarayo abhibhavatītipi
anya-e0803n4:250_8: bhūrī. Tathā hi paṭisambhidāmagge āyasmatā sāriputtena vuttaṁ ‘‘rāgaṁ abhibhūyatīti
anya-e0803n4:250_9: bhūrī, paññā. Dosaṁ mohaṁ…pe… rāgo ari, taṁ ariṁ maddatīti bhūrī, paññā. Doso. Moho…pe…
anya-e0803n4:250_10: sabbe bhavagāmino kammā ari, taṁ ariṁ maddatīti bhūrī, paññā’’. Ettha pana ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti
anya-e0803n4:250_11: padamiva ‘‘aribhū’’ti vattabbepi bhūsaddaṁ pubbanipātaṁ katvā sandhivasena bhūrīti
anya-e0803n4:250_12: padamuccāritanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Apica īdisesu nāmikapadesu vināpi upasaggena abhibhavanādiatthā
anya-e0803n4:250_13: labbhantiyeva, nākhyātikapadesūti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Idaṁ pana paññāya pariyāyavacanaṁ –
anya-e0803n4:258: Ñāṇaṁ paññāṇamummaṅgo, sattho soto ca diṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0803n4:259: Mantā bodho buddhi buddhaṁ, paṭibhānañca bodhiti.
anya-e0803n4:260: Dhammo vijjā gati monaṁ, nepakkaṁ go matī muti;
anya-e0803n4:261: Vīmaṁsā yoni dhonā ca, paṇḍā paṇḍiccayampi ca;
anya-e0803n4:275_0: Bhūtīti bhūtassa bhariyā. Yathā hi petassa bhariyā ‘‘petī’’ti vuccati, evameva bhūtassa
anya-e0803n4:275_1: bhariyā ‘‘bhūtī’’ti vuccati. Bhotīti yāya saddhiṁ kathentena sā itthī ‘‘bhotī’’ iti
anya-e0803n4:275_2: vattabbā, tasmā iminā padena itthī vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbaṁ. Yathā hi purisena
anya-e0803n4:275_3: saddhiṁ kathentena puriso ‘‘bhavaṁ’’ iti vohariyati, evameva itthiyā saddhiṁ kathentena
anya-e0803n4:275_4: itthī ‘‘bhotī’’iti vohariyati. ‘‘Kuto nu bhavaṁ bhāradvājo, ime ānesi dārake’’ti,
anya-e0803n4:275_5: ‘‘ahaṁ bhotiṁ upaṭṭhissaṁ, mā bhotī kupitā ahū’’ti cettha nidassanaṁ. Atha vā idhekacco
anya-e0803n4:275_6: satto itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmo, so ‘‘bhotī’’iti vattabbo, tasmā iminā padena itthīpi
anya-e0803n4:275_7: itthiliṅgena laddhanāmā anitthīpi vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbā. Tathā hi devaputtopi
anya-e0803n4:275_9: voharito, pageva devadhītā. Tathā hi ‘‘bhotī carahi jānāti, taṁ me akkhāhi pucchitā’’ti
anya-e0803n4:275_10: ettha pana devatāsaddamapekkhitvā ‘‘bhotī’’iti itthi liṅgavohāro kato. Atrāyaṁ suttapadattho
anya-e0803n4:275_11: ‘‘yadi so kuhako dhanatthiko tāpaso na jānāti, bhotī devatā pana jānāti ki’’nti. Apica –
anya-e0803n4:277: Karomi te taṁ vacanaṁ, tvaṁsi ācariyo mamā’’ti –
anya-e0803n4:278_2: maṭṭhakuṇḍalī voharito. Aññatrāpi devatāsaddamapekkhitvā devaputto itthiliṅgavasena voharito –
anya-e0803n4:279: ‘‘Na tvaṁ bāle vijānāsi, yathā arahataṁ vaco’’ti;
anya-e0803n4:281_0: Ettha pana ‘‘ehi bāle khamāpehi, kusarājaṁ mahabbala’’nti ettha ca itthīyeva itthiliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n4:281_1: voharitā, tasmā katthaci itthipurisapadatthasaṅkhātaṁ atthaṁ anapekkhitvā liṅgamattamevāpekkhitvā
anya-e0803n4:281_2: bhotī devatā, bhotī silā, bhotī jambū, bhotiṁ devatantiādīhi saddhiṁ paccattavacanādīni
anya-e0803n4:281_3: yojetabbāni. Katthaci pana liṅgañca atthañca apekkhitvā ‘‘bhotī itthī, bhotiṁ deva’’ntiādinā
anya-e0803n4:281_4: yojetabbāni. Vibhāvinīti vibhāvetīti vibhāvinī. Evaṁ paribhāvinītiādīsupi. Īkārantitthiliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:282_0: Bhūti sattāyamānā bhavatīti bhū. Atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha sattasaṅkhārāti
anya-e0803n4:282_1: bhū. Bhū vuccati pathavī. Abhūti vaḍḍhivirahitā kathā, na bhūtapubbāti vā abhū, abhūtapubbā
anya-e0803n4:282_2: kathā. Na bhūtāti vā abhū, abhūtā kathā. ‘‘Abhuṁ me kathaṁ nu bhaṇasi, pāpakaṁ vata
anya-e0803n4:282_3: bhāsasī’’ti idametesamatthānaṁ sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ. Ūkārantitthiliṅganiddeso. Niyatitthiliṅganiddesoyaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:283_1: niddeso nayānusārena suviññeyyova. Iccevaṁ itthiliṅgānaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ yathārahaṁ
anya-e0803n4:284_0: Idāni napuṁsakaliṅganiddeso vuccati – tatra bhūtanti catubbidhaṁ pathavīdhātuādikaṁ
anya-e0803n4:284_1: mahābhūtarūpaṁ. Tañhi aññesaṁ nissayabhāvena bhavatīti bhūtaṁ, bhavati vā tasmiṁ
anya-e0803n4:284_2: tadadhīnavuttitāya upādārūpanti bhūtaṁ. Atha vā bhūtanti satto bhūtanāmako vā. Bhūtanti
anya-e0803n4:284_3: hi napuṁsakavasena sakalo satto evaṁnāmako ca yakkhādiko vuccati. ‘‘Kālo ghasati
anya-e0803n4:284_4: bhūtāni, sabbāneva sahattanā. Yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatāni, ujjhāpetvāna bhūtāni, tamhā
anya-e0803n4:284_5: ṭhānā apakkamī’’ti evamādīsu napuṁsakappayogo veditabbo. Gātābandhasukhatthaṁ liṅgavipallāsoti
anya-e0803n4:284_6: ce? Tanna, ‘‘yakkhādīni mahābhūtāni yaṁ gaṇhanti, neva tesaṁ tassa anto, na bahi
anya-e0803n4:284_8: avagantabbaṁ. Mahābhūtanti vuttappakāraṁ catubbidhaṁ mahābhūtarūpaṁ. Tassa mahantapātubhāvādīhi
anya-e0803n4:284_9: kāraṇehi mahābhūtatā veditabbā. Kathaṁ? Mahantaṁ bhūtanti mahābhūtaṁ, māyākārasaṅkhātena
anya-e0803n4:284_10: mahābhūtena samantipi mahābhūtaṁ, yakkhādīhi mahābhūtehi samantipi mahābhūtaṁ, mahantehi
anya-e0803n4:284_11: ghāsacchādanādipaccayehi bhūtaṁ pavattantipi mahābhūtaṁ, mahāvikārabhūtantipi mahābhūtaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:284_12: Evaṁ mahantapātubhāvādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtatā veditabbā. Atridaṁ suṭṭhupalakkhitabbaṁ –
anya-e0803n4:288: Yojetabbā tiliṅge te, iti ñe yyaṁ visesato.
anya-e0803n4:290: Idāni bhūto, cittāni, bhūtāni vimalāni tu.
anya-e0803n4:293: Bhavittanti vaḍḍhitaṭṭhānaṁ. Tañhi bhavanti vaḍḍhanti etthāti bhavittanti vuccati, ‘‘janittaṁ me bhavittaṁ me, iti paṅke avassayi’’nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:296: Bhūnanti bhavanaṁ bhūnaṁ vaddhi. ‘‘Ahameva dūsiyā bhūnahatā, rañño mahāpatāpassā’’ti, ‘‘bhūnahaccaṁ kataṁ mayā’’ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:297_0: Bhavananti bhavanakriyā. Atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti ettha sattā puttadhītāhi nānāsampattīhi
anya-e0803n4:297_1: cāti bhavanaṁ vuccati geho, ‘‘pettikaṁ bhavanaṁ mamā’’ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṁ
anya-e0803n4:297_2: vacanaṁ. ‘‘Geho gharañca āvāso, bhavanañca niketana’’nti idaṁ pariyāyavacanaṁ. Parābhavananti
anya-e0803n4:297_3: avaddhimāpajjanaṁ. Sambhavananti suṭṭhu bhavanaṁ. Vibhavananti ucchedo vināso vā.
anya-e0803n4:297_4: Pātubhavananti pākaṭatā sarūpalābho iccevattho. Āvibhavananti paccakkhabhāvo. Tirobhavananti
anya-e0803n4:297_5: paṭicchannabhāvo. Vinābhavananti vinābhāvo. Sotthibhavananti suvatthitā. Paribhavananti
anya-e0803n4:297_6: pīḷanā hīḷanā vā. Abhibhavananti vidhamanaṁ. Adhibhavananti ajjhottharaṇaṁ . Anubhavananti
anya-e0803n4:297_7: paribhuñjanaṁ. Samanubhavananti suṭṭhu paribhuñjanaṁ. Paccanubhavananti adhipatibhāvenapi
anya-e0803n4:298: Atthavibhāvīti atthassa vibhāvanasīlaṁ cittaṁ vā ñāṇaṁ vā kulaṁ vā atthavibhāvi. Evaṁ dhammavibhāvi. Ikārantanapuṁsakaliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n4:299_0: Gotrabhūti paññattārammaṇaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ vā gotrabhucittaṁ. Tañhi kāmāvacaragottamabhibhavati,
anya-e0803n4:299_1: mahaggatagottañca bhāveti nibbattetīti ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti vuccati. Apica gotrabhūti nibbānārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0803n4:299_2: maggavīthiyaṁ pavattaṁ gotrabhuñāṇaṁ vā saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ vā phalasamāpattivīthiyaṁ
anya-e0803n4:299_3: pavattaṁ gotrabhuñāṇaṁ. Tesu hi paṭhamaṁ puthujjanagottamabhibhavati, ariyagottañca
anya-e0803n4:299_4: bhāveti, gottābhidhānā ca nibbānato ārammaṇakaraṇavasena bhavatīti ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti
anya-e0803n4:299_5: vuccati, dutiyaṁ pana saṅkhārārammaṇampi samānaṁ āsevanapaccayabhāvena sasampayuttāni
anya-e0803n4:299_6: phalacittāni gottābhidhāne nibbānamhi bhāvetīti ‘‘gotrabhū’’ti vuccati. Idaṁ pāḷivavatthānaṁ –
anya-e0803n4:304: Dīghabhāvena vuttaṁ tu, napuṁsakanti no vade;
anya-e0803n4:305: Binduvantī’tare bhedā, tayo iti hi bhāsitā.
anya-e0803n4:306: Īkārantā ca ūdantā, rassattaṁ yanti sāsane;
anya-e0803n4:308: Cittena saha bhavatīti cittasahabhu, cittena saha na bhavatīti nacittasahabhu, rūpaṁ. Ukārantanapuṁsakaliṅganiddeso. Niyatanapuṁsakaliṅganiddesoyaṁ.
anya-e0803n4:309_1: nayānusārena suviññeyyova. Iccevaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgānaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ yathārahaṁ nibbacanādivasena
anya-e0803n4:309_2: niddeso vibhāvito. Iccevaṁ sabbathāpi liṅgattayaniddeso samatto.
anya-e0803n4:314: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
